filmography.title: Stand Up and Cheer!
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a Broadway performer who steals the show with her song and dance number 'Baby, Take a Bow', launching her to stardom.
filmography.plot: The President appoints a Secretary of Amusement to cheer up the Depression-weary American public with a massive variety show.

filmography.title: Little Miss Marker
filmography.role_description: A little girl left as an I.O.U. ('marker') for a gambling debt who melts the hearts of a gang of hardened bookies.
filmography.plot: A sorrowful bookie winds up with a young girl as collateral for a bet, and she begins to reform him and his criminal friends.

filmography.title: Baby Take a Bow
filmography.role_description: The daughter of an ex-convict trying to go straight who unwittingly helps solve a jewel heist.
filmography.plot: An ex-con trying to make a new life for his family is accused of stealing pearls, and his daughter helps clear his name.

filmography.title: Now and Forever
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a swindler, played by Gary Cooper, who becomes the moral compass that forces him to reconsider his life of crime.
filmography.plot: A con artist travels the world with his new wife and young daughter, trying to stay one step ahead of the law.

filmography.title: Bright Eyes
filmography.role_description: An orphaned girl living with her mother's employers who becomes the center of a custody battle; features the iconic song 'On the Good Ship Lollipop'.
filmography.plot: An orphaned girl is caught in a custody battle between a rich, cranky old man and a dashing aviator.

filmography.title: The Little Colonel
filmography.role_description: A young girl in the post-Civil War South who bridges the rift between her mother and her grandfather, famously dancing with Bill 'Bojangles' Robinson.
filmography.plot: A young girl helps reunite her estranged grandfather and mother in the Reconstruction-era South.

filmography.title: Our Little Girl
filmography.role_description: A child who runs away from home to bring her bickering parents back together.
filmography.plot: The daughter of a doctor tries to prevent her parents' divorce by running away from home.

filmography.title: Curly Top
filmography.role_description: An orphan who is adopted by a wealthy trustee and plays matchmaker for her older sister; features 'Animal Crackers in My Soup'.
filmography.plot: A wealthy trustee adopts a young orphan and her older sister, leading to romance and musical numbers.

filmography.title: The Littlest Rebel
filmography.role_description: A Confederate officer's daughter who charms President Lincoln to save her father from execution.
filmography.plot: A young girl appeals to President Lincoln to save her father, a Confederate spy, during the Civil War.

filmography.title: Captain January
filmography.role_description: A shipwrecked orphan raised by a lighthouse keeper who fights to stay with him when a truant officer intervenes.
filmography.plot: A lighthouse keeper tries to keep the little girl he rescued from a shipwreck out of the hands of a strict truant officer.

filmography.title: Poor Little Rich Girl
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a wealthy soap tycoon who gets lost and joins a vaudeville radio act.
filmography.plot: A wealthy girl runs away from home and joins a couple of vaudeville performers who don't know her true identity.

filmography.title: Dimples
filmography.role_description: A street entertainer in 1850s New York who lives with her pickpocket grandfather and is taken in by a wealthy widow.
filmography.plot: A young street performer tries to keep her grandfather out of trouble while winning the hearts of New York society.

filmography.title: Stowaway
filmography.role_description: An orphan stranded in Shanghai who stows away on a cruise ship and plays cupid for a playboy and a potential wife.
filmography.plot: A young orphan in China stows away on a ship and is adopted by a playboy and his fiancée.

filmography.title: Wee Willie Winkie
filmography.role_description: A young girl living at a British army outpost in India who wins over her gruff grandfather and negotiates peace with a rebel leader.
filmography.plot: A young girl travels to India to live with her grandfather, a British colonel, and charms the regiment while befriending a rebel chief.

filmography.title: Heidi
filmography.role_description: An orphan sent to live with her grumpy grandfather in the Swiss Alps, bringing joy to his life before being taken away to Frankfurt.
filmography.plot: An orphan girl is sent to live with her reclusive grandfather in the Swiss Alps, but is later stolen away to be a companion to an invalid.

filmography.title: Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm
filmography.role_description: A talented young singer who is discouraged by her strict aunt but covertly becomes a radio star.
filmography.plot: A talented orphan lives with her strict aunt who forbids her from show business, but a neighbor helps her become a radio sensation.

filmography.title: Little Miss Broadway
filmography.role_description: An orphan who is adopted by a hotel manager and puts on a show to save the hotel from being closed by a wealthy neighbor.
filmography.plot: An orphan is provisionally adopted by the manager of a hotel for show business people, but the owner wants to shut it down.

filmography.title: Just Around the Corner
filmography.role_description: A girl who tries to help her architect father during the Depression by organizing a benefit concert.
filmography.plot: A young girl tries to help her father raise money for his architectural project by befriending a wealthy banker.

filmography.title: The Little Princess
filmography.role_description: A wealthy girl in a Victorian boarding school who becomes a servant when her father is reported dead, but never loses hope.
filmography.plot: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing during the Boer War.

filmography.title: Susannah of the Mounties
filmography.role_description: The sole survivor of a wagon train attack who is adopted by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police and helps prevent an Indian war.
filmography.plot: A young girl survives an Indian attack and is adopted by the Mounties, where she helps bridge the gap between the settlers and the Blackfoot tribe.

filmography.title: The Blue Bird
filmography.role_description: A selfish girl who embarks on a magical journey with her brother to find the Blue Bird of Happiness.
filmography.plot: Two children search for the Blue Bird of Happiness in a fantasy world, only to find it in their own backyard.

filmography.title: Since You Went Away
filmography.role_description: The patriotic and spirited teenage daughter of a family struggling on the home front during World War II.
filmography.plot: With her husband away at war, a woman must manage their home and two daughters while dealing with rationing and loss.

filmography.title: I'll Be Seeing You
filmography.role_description: The niece of a woman on furlough from prison, who helps facilitate the romance between her aunt and a shell-shocked soldier.
filmography.plot: A soldier suffering from combat fatigue meets a woman on Christmas furlough from prison, and they help each other heal.

filmography.title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
filmography.role_description: An impressionable teenager who develops a crush on a playboy artist, leading to a court order that he must date her.
filmography.plot: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, and the judge who is her older sister orders him to date her so that she will see the error of her ways.

filmography.title: Fort Apache
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a strict cavalry colonel who falls in love with a young sergeant against her father's wishes.
filmography.plot: At a remote cavalry post, a strict and arrogant commander clashes with his troops and leads them into a disastrous confrontation with the Apaches.
filmography.awards: Locarno International Film Festival: Win – Best Director

filmography.title: Mr. Belvedere Goes to College
filmography.role_description: A war widow and journalism student who finds her life managed by the eccentric genius Lynn Belvedere.
filmography.plot: Genius Lynn Belvedere enrolls in college and tries to play matchmaker for a young widow while dealing with hazing.

filmography.title: A Kiss for Corliss
filmography.role_description: A teenager who feigns a romance with a playboy to make her boyfriend jealous; Temple's final film role.
filmography.plot: A teenager tries to make her boyfriend jealous by pretending to be the latest fling of a notorious playboy.
